stimulusHtml: Shown above is a slope field for which of the following differential equations?
choicesHtml: d y d x = x y − x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4221@

d y d x = x y + x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4216@

d y d x = y − x 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@422C@

d y d x = ( y − 1 ) x 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@448F@

d y d x = ( y − 1 ) 3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4393@
